plugins\/enedis\/desktop\/php\/enedis.ph.Cocher la case pour utiliser le template: Check the box to use the widget template in the colors of the Linky counter

plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Erreur d\\'authentification : vérifier l: Authentication error: check the validity of the username and password
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.L\\'identifiant du compte Enedis doit êt: The identifier of the Enedis account must be entered
plugins\/enedis\/core\/class\/enedis.cla.Le mot de passe du compte Enedis doit êt: The password for the Enedis account must be entered

info.json.Récupérer les informations du compteur c: Retrieve the information of the Linky smart meter from their Enedis customer account. Please note, it is essential to have access to the "professional" part of the Enedis site with your usual identifiers (see the documentation)
